description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget 'BirthdayCard' which displays birthday information in a card format. It imports Flutter material package and a local 'birthday' model, and builds a UI component that shows person name, birthday date, age, and notification indicator.

classes.name: BirthdayCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that presents birthday details inside a styled card with tap interaction.

methods.name: BirthdayCard
methods.description: Constructor for the BirthdayCard widget, requiring a Birthday object.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the birthday card, including layout, styling, and interactive elements.
